Room.Name: Arboretum Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the west side of the famous Hanging Gardens, on Arboretum Way.
Room.LongDescription: Actually, this is really just a very wide path through the trees, but it is well maintained and you find it quite clean. There are a number of owls overhead, and strangely, you can understand their conversation. They invite you to join them, if you can fly. To the east you can see the second level.
